Invocation Name: filtrete
des:
The Filtrete™ Smart skill can be used to interact with and control your Filtrete™ Smart Air Purifier, and check the current status of your Filtrete™ Smart Air Filters. It works with your Filtrete Smart mobile app to help you better understand and manage your home’s air quality, gives general tips to improve it, and informs you about the air quality outdoors. 

To get started, you will need to have an account created on the Filtrete™ Smart mobile app.

After enabling the skill and entering your Filtrete account information, you can interact with the Alexa skill as follows:

*For SMART AIR FILTERS paired with your account*

First open the skill by saying “Alexa, open Filtrete”; you can then ask:

- “What is the status of my filters?”
- “Do I need to replace any of my filters?”
- “Add a replacement filter for hallway to my shopping list.”
- “What is the outdoor air like?”
- “How do I improve my air quality?”

(Please note: you do not need to go through “Alexa discovery” for your Smart Air Filters; once the skill is enabled you can interact with the filters using the above)

*For SMART AIR PURIFIERS paired with your account*

Once the skill is successfully enabled, “discover” your paired Smart Air Purifiers and add them to your Devices tab in the Alexa App. When using the skill, you need established names for your Filtrete™ Smart Air Purifier. There are two ways to define these names:

- Use the names you previously set up: they are shown in the Filtrete™ Smart App and can be changed. 
- Create an Alexa group, like Bedroom or Kitchen, and add the device to the group. More information is available at Create a Smart Home Device Group (http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home-groups)

You can interact and control the Smart Air Purifier as follows:

To turn it on/off:
 - “Alexa, turn on the air purifier”
 - “Alexa switch off the bedroom air purifier”
To check temperature:
 - “Alexa, what’s the temperature on the air purifier?”
To change the fan speed (1, 2, 3, 4, Auto):
 - “Alexa, set the air purifier fan speed to Auto”
To change or check display brightness (high, medium, off):
 - “Alexa, set air purifier brightness to off”
 - “What’s the air purifier brightness?”

This skill uses Alexa Shopping to make purchases on Amazon. Alexa allows purchasing by voice using your default payment and shipping settings. You can set a voice confirmation code, turn off purchasing, and see product and order details in your Alexa app.
